attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: me and my sister know what its like fighting social services and them not listening harengey needs to be punished so other councils will see they wont get away with it

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/babyPpeter/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
